overview:
Scott is a marketing and management executive for consumer technology companies.

He currently consults for clients intent on bringing disruptive product technologies to the living room.

Previously, Scott was CEO of Glide TV, where he transformed the one product mouse company into an Internet TV solution provider selling cloud services, client software and CE devices.

Before GlideTV, Scott was general manager of the multimedia division at NVIDIA Corporation, where he led the team that captured the lionâ€™s share of the market in high definition video processors for PCs and notebooks and drove the companyâ€™s digital home business.

Before NVIDIA, Scott ran the multimedia and graphics card business unit at Diamond Multimedia, managing product development and marketing while growing the company into the industry leader both in revenue and brand recognition.

Prior to Diamond, Scott founded and led Binar Graphics, a pioneer in computer graphics and video processing software for PCs. Scott holds four patents in video processing.
